item.description:
All-

To get this thing rolling, I'm "piggy-backing" with another group for a couple of reasons 1. This is very short notice and 2. I want to meet others who already know this hike... (thanks Mike from dog-hiking)

Mt. Wachusett Hike CHANGE OF TRAIL
After several conversations with Park Rangers, we will be hiking the Bicentennial Trail starting from the visitors Center located off Mountain Rd
Directions here

Directions to Wachusett

Map Here:
Wachusette State Park map

Weather here:
Weather

The first portion of the hike will be from the parking lot / near a road so you should bring a leash for this portion.

Foul weather cancels.
item.how_to_find_us: Red Van, Hunter Orange "basesball cap", German shepard and Black Lab
item.name: Mt Wachusett Hike
